For more information on these results, see the "Troubleshooting Slow Network Connection" documentation page.

High network latency might cause your cluster to respond slowly. Low upload or download speeds might cause jobs that transfer large amounts of data to run slowly. If you encounter performance issues on a cluster with high network latency, low upload speed, or low download speed, contact your cluster administrator or see the "Troubleshooting Slow Network Connection" documentation page for more information.

The parallel pool validation stage is likely to fail because you already have an active parallel pool.
Slow network connection detected between MATLAB and the cluster.
Cluster does not support this stage.
